name: SGB Zelda Battle System Alpha
description:
I worked a long time just to get all of these scripts working, and yet it still far from completion. HOWEVER, there is a lot of content to be studied here if you are aspiring to create your own action RPG in Smile Game Builder. There are 20 magic spells that work for the most part. There is a combo system that utilized stamina and what combos you learn. There is a Bow and Arrow system. A Grapple Hook attack that stuns enemies, which will lead to big combos if paired with magic and attacks. A limit Break System, that will have you unleash a devastating un-interuptable combo to a single foe. So cool beats too. SORRY FOR THE 2 ENEMIES, THEY HAVE MILES OF SCRIPT A PIECE!!!

     Controls:

Press [Space] = Attack

Hold [Space] for 1 second for STAB

Hold [Space] for 4 seconds for Blade Beam

Hold [Shift] will make you run and ready your BOW/GRAPPLEHOOK

Hold [Shift] and press [Space] for ARROW SHOT

Hold [Shift] and press [X] for GRAPPLE HOOK STUN

Hold [Q] to summon MAGICS

Hold [ESC] for 1 second, and press it again for MENU

If facing the enemy when it attacks you, you can also parry the attack by pressing [SPACE] when prompted.

There is some stuff to discover, so have fun and let me know what ya think!

FYI 1 enemy is stronger than the other for testing sake..ALSO BUGGY
